heroSubtitle: Paste any URL to load it inside a sandboxed frame (no JavaScript).
blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Updates and notes from Safe Reader
blog.empty: No posts available in this language yet.
about.title: About Safe Reader
about.body1: Safe Reader lets you inspect shared links inside a sandboxed view so you can decide whether to trust them.
about.body2: The project is open source and welcomes contributions from the community.
terms.title: Terms
terms.body1: Safe Reader previews links inside an isolated iframe to reduce risk, but you remain responsible for the URLs you open.
terms.body2: We do not store the URLs you preview; the address stays within your browser.
terms.body3: By using Safe Reader you agree to use it responsibly and comply with local regulations.
terms.body4: We disclaim any liability for damages resulting from the use of Safe Reader. We only access what is published publicly on the web.
